4.A: By loving him and doing what he commands.

5.Q: Why are you to glorify God?
5.A: Because he made me and takes care of me.

6.Q: Is there more than one true God?
6.A: No. There is only one true God.

7.Q: In how many Persons does this one God exist?

8.A: The Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

14.Q: Where do you learn how to love and obey God?

15.A: Chosen men who were inspired by the Holy Spirit.

18.Q: Of what were our first parents made?
18.A: God made Adam's body out of the ground and Eve's body out of a rib from Adam.

19.Q: What else did God give Adam and Eve besides bodies?
19.A: He gave them souls that will never die.

20.Q: Do you have a soul as well as a body?
20.A: Yes. I have a soul that will never die.

21.A: My soul includes all of me that should know and love God.

22.Q: How do you know that your soul will last forever?
22.A: Because the Bible tells me so.

23.Q: In what condition did God make Adam and Eve?
23.A: He made them holy and happy.

24.Q: What covenant did God make with Adam?

25.A: A relationship that God establishes with us and guarantees by his word.
